nodes.content: What’s the first thing you did after waking up?
Ah yes, doomscrolling — the breakfast of champions.
Checking your phone early? That’s dedication… to staying informed.
Phones have more bacteria than toilet seats. Enjoy holding that.
Brushed your teeth? Congrats on achieving the bare minimum today.
Clean teeth, clean mind. You’re unstoppable.
Sharks grow new teeth forever. Feeling jealous yet?
Back to sleep? Bold strategy to avoid responsibilities.
Extra sleep? That’s self-care at expert level.
Dolphins sleep with one eye open. Creepy, right?
Pick a snack:
Chips? Just edible air with a crunch.
Salty, crispy joy — you deserve it.
Some scientists once made a musical instrument out of chips.
Fruit? Trying to convince yourself you’re healthy?
Fruit is nature’s candy. Good choice.
Bananas are berries but strawberries aren’t. Science is drunk.
Chocolate? Sweet escape from reality, huh?
Chocolate is proof the universe loves you.
White chocolate isn’t actually chocolate. It’s impostor sugar.
How’s your desk right now?
Clean desk? Are you okay? Blink twice if it’s a cry for help.
A clean desk means a clean mind. You’re on fire.
In Japan, there’s a museum dedicated to dust. Maybe they’d like your desk’s leftovers.
Messy desk? That’s not creativity, that’s chaos.
Messy desk, genius brain. Einstein vibes.
A study once linked messy desks to eating more cookies. Coincidence? No.
No desk? So you’re just balancing life on your lap now?
No desk, no limits. Freedom is yours.
In medieval times, people wrote while lying on their stomachs. Comfort over posture.
